General.Name: Gobarto S.A.
General.Description: Gobarto S.A. engages in slaughtering, cutting, producing, and distribution of red meat, pork, beef, poultry, and game in Poland and internationally. The company also operates a limousine cattle breeding farm. In addition, it is involved in the production and trading of rapeseed, rye, wheat, and corn. The company was formerly known as Polski Koncern Miesny DUDA S.A. and changed its name to Gobarto S.A. in June 2016. Gobarto S.A. was founded in 1990 and is based in Warsaw, Poland. Gobarto S.A. is a subsidiary of Cedrob S.A.
